name: Practice Fusion
description: Practice Fusion's Electronic Health Record was developed from the real workflows of office-based physicians. Our free, web-based EHR software is fully-featured enabling you to effectively manage your practice. Use our system to schedule an appointment, complete a medical chart during a visit, send a prescription with our e-prescribing feature and bill for your practice. Our Electronic Health Record software is so easy to use, you can sign up and start charting immediately.
